E-Mail Messages
Date: Thursday, 2/2/1991
Subject: Fan Reaction
Hello Boss,
The fans are not happy that you let George Brett go.
The overall fan interest decreases noticeably.

Sincerly,
Your PR Director



Date: Monday, 5/1/1991
Subject: Progress of Rick White
Dear Sir,
Rick White is doing pretty good at A Daytona Tortugas!
He has an ERA of 3.08, so you might want
to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director
